actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to extend the period during which general revenue sharing payments are made and to increase the amount of such payments.

summary.text: Extends the period through fiscal year 1980 during which general revenue-sharing payments are to be made under the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972. Increases such payments by specified amounts.

titles.title: A bill to amend the State and Local Fiscal Assistance Act of 1972 to extend the period during which general revenue sharing payments are made and to increase the amount of such payments.
